caption:
A metallic possibly toilet paper holder with a silver finish and cylindrical shape. Has a horizontal bar for holding rolls. Likely used for dispensing toilet paper. Mounted on the wall near a toilet in a bathroom setting.

A metallic possibly towel rack with a silver finish and elongated shape. Has a curved bar for hanging towels. Likely used for storing and drying towels. Mounted on the wall near a sink and storage shelves in a bathroom setting.

A metallic possibly toilet paper holder with a silver finish and cylindrical shape. Has a horizontal bar for holding rolls. Likely used for dispensing toilet paper. Mounted on the wall near a toilet in a bathroom setting.

A metallic possibly towel rack with a silver finish and elongated shape. Has a curved bar for hanging towels. Likely used for storing and drying towels. Mounted on the wall near a sink and storage shelves in a bathroom setting.

A white ceramic toilet with a smooth surface and rounded shape. Features a closed lid and seat. Used for waste disposal. Positioned next to a bathtub and a trash can in a bathroom environment.
